content: hey all - in addition to the #terminology channel, we have a new channel, the #snomed channel. This channel is a shared channel between the FHIR chat server and the SNOMED chat server ("FHIR" over there). The intent of the channel is to cover the deeper details of the snomed/FHIR work
Yes. We'll be reviewing this and beginning to plan how to use it across our two organizations for the SNOMED-FHIR work on the TermInfo call tomorrow (4:00 PM Eastern).
